name: Tachyon Protocol
description: Tachyon Protocol is a decentralized internet protocol co-launched by V SYSTEMS and X-VPN that aims to create a trusted, stable, fast, reliable and transparent decentralized information network. By implementing techniques from DHT, blockchain, UDP and encryption, Tachyon Protocol is committed to building the next generation TCP/IP that can provide a self-sufficient internet environment with high security, untraceability, availability, and maximum network speed.
